trans-unit.source: Several conditions are required to access the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

seg-source.mrk: Several conditions are required to access the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />:

target.mrk: Plusieurs conditions sont requises pour accéder à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> :

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> must be enabled in the global agents parameters. To enable the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, see <MadCap:xref href="Enable_Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Enable Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> must be enabled in the global agents parameters.

To enable the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, see <MadCap:xref href="Enable_Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Enable Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> doit être activée dans les paramètres des agents globaux.

Pour activer la<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, voir <MadCap:xref href="Enable_Web_Restore.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Enable Web Restore</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> must be enabled in the strategy used by the agents to restore. For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Enable_Web_Restore_for_Strategy.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Enable Web Restore operations for a Strategy</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> must be enabled in the strategy used by the agents to restore.

For more details, see <MadCap:xref href="Enable_Web_Restore_for_Strategy.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Enable Web Restore operations for a Strategy</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: La <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> doit être activée dans la stratégie utilisée par les agents pour restaurer.

Pour plus de détails, voir <MadCap:xref href="Enable_Web_Restore_for_Strategy.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Enable Web Restore operations for a Strategy</MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: A restore token is required to launch a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> session. This code is generated upon request in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. To create a restore token, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: A restore token is required to launch a <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> session.
This code is generated upon request in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
To create a restore token, see <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Un jeton de restauration est requis pour lancer une session de <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln_web_resto" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Ce code est généré sur demande dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Pour créer un jeton de restauration, voir <MadCap:xref href="Restore_Token.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Restore Token</MadCap:xref>.
